reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**

*RDA/ Velocity Coil/ 6 Wrap Single Fused Kanthal Clapton 2×26 core 32 wrap W/ 45 Wicking/ Full Rayon Ω/0.26*

**Testing**

Steep Time/4 weeks % Used/ 2.2 PG/VG 50/50 Nic%/0

**Mouthfeel**

Heavy on the tongue, light on the nose, with a sharp mouthfeel, and light density4 out of 10.

**Throat Hit**5/10

**Flavor Properties**

Super sweet and syrupy, with a very complex flavor hints of caramel, citrus, and vanilla. I also get a dull, bitter, dry thing going on with this flavor.

**Relatable Flavors**

Reminds me of off-brand Cola not quite Coca-Cola but still good.

**Off Flavors**

A strong aftertaste not necessarily unpleasant also. extremely harsh until about 3 weeks out.

**Position In The Recipe**

This could be a very useful drink base, or used as an additive to dry out other more wet flavors at low percentages.

**Pairings**

Dark berries ,some fruits such as Apple, vanillas, tobaccos, a few cream flavorings such as vanilla bean ice cream, and a handful of spices like nutmeg, cardamom, and cinnamon.

**Recipe**

https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/share/4da7a438-bd0d-4831-83f2-f9b7e6370ecc

**Notes**

As always here is a Wikipedia on Cola I personally found very interesting I'm drinking a lot of this garbage and never knew what actually went in it.( outside the obvious sugar )

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cola

And a link to where you can find it.

http://www.ecigexpress.com/diy-e-liquid/diy-e-liquid-flavors/inawera/fruit-and-sweet/cola-by-inawera-10ml.html

**Rating** 75/100

**Please if your opinion differs, or you have another review for this post it in the comments. Will help the master list with multiple reviews in one spot.**
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Cola
